page.title: 08Housing in Soham
page.content: Most houses in Soham were built between 1965 and 1975,and fewest houses were built between the first and second world wars.The most common type of house is a two-storey detached but there are many single-storey semi- detached homes. The majority of houses are built of brick with a tiled roof, but there are a few flint houses and some slate roofs. There are many new houses being built, and most residents of Soham are in favour of the new developments because they hope that this will improve local amenities. However some people do not welcome new housing development as they are afraid that it might spoil the friendly atmosphere in the town. There are several long- established families in the town who have lived here for more than 30 years.
